cause.description:
By raising the temperature of the earth, Albany will no longer be an unbearably freezing place. Eventually, the warm weather will make albany look tropical. No more walking through tunnels that keep you warm by blowing exhaust fumes at you. Just imagine not having to wait outside bogies in the freezing rain.
1. Palm trees on campus
2. Don't have to suffer for dressing nice
3. Rory knows im right
cause.name: global warming is good
